fields.original_string: private static final PolicyId POLICY_ID = PolicyId.of(NAMESPACE, NAME);
private static final PolicyPlaceholder UNDER_TEST = ImmutablePolicyPlaceholder.INSTANCE;
static final ImmutablePolicyPlaceholder INSTANCE = new ImmutablePolicyPlaceholder();
